xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/512961-America Rebuilds: A Year at Ground Zero 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xSSUTklY5aTe2PoETeT91vGqg7d.jpg Documents the clearing of the wreckage of the World Trade Center from the perspective of the construction workers, firemen, and engineers who accomplished the task in the nine months following the Sept. 2001 terrorist attacks. America Rebuilds: A Year at Ground Zero
